title.rendered: Work schedule for December and January

content.rendered:
LTL S.p.A. is pleased to present the work schedule for December/January, in order to improve the order flow/shipment organization at your company.

Friday, 20th December 2019
We will receive orders until 13.30 pm due to the inventory arrangements.

Tuesday, 24th December 2019
Orders will not be shipped due to carriers’ holiday.
Customer assistance will be available until 12.00 pm due to the early closure.

Wednesday 25th December 2019
National holiday.

Thursday 26th December 2019
National holiday.

Tuesday, 31st December 2019
Orders will not be shipped due to carriers’ holiday.
Customer assistance is available until 12.00 pm due to the early closure.

Wednesday, 1st January 2020
National holiday.

Monday, 6th January 2020
National holiday.
